It's trash every single character in this one. MC & FMC love was mutual but FMC doesn't reject harassment & MC let that shitshow happen in front of his face. Then he takes responsibility for the children & marry her. First if u love a girl u don't let that happen. Second u don't take responsibility for other bastards doings. Third if u marry u make sure u cut ties with those shitty kind of people. MC becomes father while the bastard makes the girl a breeding machine. I guess the first kid was MC's but bc both didn't cut ties with him he just made her fucktoy to breed children while MC takes all responsibility. FMC doesn't even love him if she did she wouldn't do something this cruel after they r finally together. All n all trash character s with trash story didn't read just saw images don't read seeing is enough this shit.
